
---
title: "Gambling"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(ggthemes)
```

## Load the data

```{r}
gambling <- read_tsv("gambling_data.txt")
```


```{r}
ggplot(gambling, aes(x=QuestionMark.RT)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 50, col="white") +
  theme_pander()

ggplot(gambling, aes(x=HCPID, y=QuestionMark.ACC))+
  stat_summary(fun.data="mean_se") +
  theme_pander()
```
